abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Pieter Stek at
            the Board meeting of August 26, 1997 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy, the Second Structural Adjustment Credit
            and the Second Structural Adjustment Technical Assistance
            Credit for Armenia.
